Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 24 August 2025

howers  or  thundershowers  may  occur  at  a  few  places
Trincomalee, Mullaittivu, Kilinochchi and Vavuniya districts after 2.00 p.m.

ainly fair weather will prevail over elsewhere of the island.
